title: Lizzie #8: A Very Lizzie Christmas: Lizzie McGuire: A Very Lizzie Christmas - Book #8
description: Lizzie is sure her "Rock and Roll" float idea will be the winner at the Christmas Parade. She just needs a little help. But everyone has deserted her to help some old guy. Lizzie's furious. Is she forgetting the true meaning of Christmas? Plus, Lizzie makes a Christmas wish to meet pop star Aaron Carter.
author: Jasmine Jones
